A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as Mobsters foot raised above him. "Oh P=
it" he yelled as he turned to run. His energy was low so he didn't want to =
risk his shield not holding. He ran toward Mobster. Mobsters foot struck th=
e ground behind Razor Claw, the impact shook the ground sending Razor claw =
rolling past the giant gestalt. He rolled to his feat and turned again read=
y for battle. He dove forward at Mobsters rear end hoping the giant would s=
till be off balance enough to knock over.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 20=
00 10:46 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  (I normally am against stomp=
ing, but...)
   
  Mobster raised his foot.

  Mobster (Kracken voice): Ove=
r!

  Mobster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw...
    ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: S=
unday, December 24, 2000 12:11 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Ra=
zor Claw remained still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him. H=
e opened a comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal, =
I'm pinned down and need some coverfire."
      ----- Original Message ----=
- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturda=
y, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      Mob=
ster stood still. The raptor would have to move sometime.

      Mobster (H=
orn Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime. Who helped to build this hou=
se?

      Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching=
...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
       =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM=

        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Razor Claw knew that there =
was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon of that size. he transfor=
med to Raptor mode and used full strength on his shield. The ground around =
him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was sapping to much of his s=
trength. The raptor couldn't move without deactivating his shield.
        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: SOULSTICE 
          To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
      =
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Mobster took a scratch of dama=
ge, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant cannon at Razo=
rclaw and fired...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            Fr=
om: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Frida=
y, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


   =
         Razor Claw stood confused for the moment, he tried to show no weak=
ness. He stepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed=
 to impress me?" he asked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
           =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: SOULSTICE 
           =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 =
10:50 AM
              Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


              Gigas d=
idn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

          =
    Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, =
it'll work 2 ways.

              Mobster switches voices.

              K=
racken: But right now, we're Mobster...
                ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
      =
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                Razor Claw looked =
up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Le=
t's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock=
 you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled=
 his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first=
."
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: =
SOULSTICE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent=
: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
                  Subject: Re: Sorr=
y soulstice


                  Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fig=
ht. That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. I=
n other words, I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me ta=
king the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still figh=
t. You know, you should join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.=


                  Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...=

                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From=
: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
   Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                    Subject:=
 Sorry soulstice


                    Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in =
the battle. I found it.

                    claw struck him, but Gigas did=
n't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. H=
orn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he again came through =
for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of =
the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, l=
ike Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

                 =
   Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like he=
ll but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be kn=
ocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the=
 attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best sho=
t, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                 =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
   =
                   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Tues=
day, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                      Subject: Re: three on =
one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


                 =
     OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
                 =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: CYBERWOL=
F4 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                       =
 Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                        Subject:=
 three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


       =
                 Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the bat=
tle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported hi=
s actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were =
out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword=
 and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice.=
"

                        He aproached the three bots ready for battle and=
 hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
                          --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                          From: dachande 
     =
                     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent=
: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                          Subject: Ecli=
pse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


                          ::Eclipse/Wolveritr=
on/Ramus::
                           
                              They h=
ad heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the c=
onflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and t=
ogther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.









=










        eGroups Sponsor
